Knock Knock
John lived alone in his house in the forest.He was an introvert.His wife Caroline died whom he loved a lot.One day as he was resting in his house after a long day work,some one knocked on the door..

John-Who is it?
Milkman,The voice replied....
John-But I hired no milkman.plus no milkman comes in night.
I was playing with you...I am your brother..open the door-The voice replied.
John-But I have no brother..I have a cousin who lives in paris.
I am that cousin..The voice answered..
John-I lied,you idiot...I have no bloody cousin..who the damn are you?
